backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining data models, storage maps, authorization mixin, admin/client auth state, rate limiting, and shipment/invoice/payment/client management logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old shipment records into a new format by adding a coordinates field set to null.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and behavior in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling admin/client sessions, quoting form submission, shipment tracking, and conditional portal rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Displays a selected client’s profile and provides shipment and invoice tabs with tables. Includes a back button and formatted client details.
Form for creating or updating a client profile using a Principal ID. Handles validation, submission, and profile field inputs.
Modal dialog to create a new client account with email/mobile and auto‑generated temporary password. Handles form submission, password copying, and success state.
Fetches and displays a searchable table of all clients. Allows selecting a client to view details.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard showing tabs for clients, client creation, tracking, revenue, MSG91 config, and invoice export. Handles authentication and client detail navigation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Button that exports all invoices as a CSV file using a mutation hook. Shows loading state and success/error toasts.
Shows all invoices for a client, lets admins create new invoices, download PDFs, and send WhatsApp reminders. Includes status badges and form dialog for invoice creation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: UI for storing the MSG91 API key and verifying access tokens with feedback and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReven: Displays revenue analytics with loading, error, empty states, and a line chart of revenue over time.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Static panel explaining that role management is disabled under password-only authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Shows a client's shipments and provides a dialog form to create new shipments.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Admin panel rendering a Google Map with shipment markers, loading states, error handling, and dynamic script loading for the Maps API.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Error boundary that displays detailed error information and offers refresh and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple screen indicating lack of permission to access a section.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated card explaining that Internet Identity-based admin bootstrap is unavailable in password-only mode.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Password-based admin login form with loading, validation, and error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Logout button that ends the admin session and scrolls back to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog collecting company details but no longer used; submits a form and closes the dialog.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard showing shipment and invoice tabs with logout and WhatsApp support actions.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Displays client's invoices with status badges and actions like PDF download and payment, loading data via hooks.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: Card for mandatory client password change with validation and mutation-based submission.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Wrapper providing login and signup tabs for the client portal.
Login card supporting password-based and OTP-based authentication with validation and related mutations.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Displays active and delivered shipments for a client using query hooks, with loading states and table layouts.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Provides a client signup form with validation, mutation submission, success handling, and error messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Manages client session tokens via context, enabling storage, retrieval, and clearing of the client session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Exposes queries and mutations to check and perform admin bootstrap actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Handles admin session tokens, validating stored tokens, performing admin login/logout, and clearing cache on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSession.ts: Empty file placeholder for client session hook implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, providing identity loading, login, clearing, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines admin, client, and shipment-related queries and mutations, integrating session tokens and backend actor calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme CSS variables, global styles, and gold utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML invoice in a new window using styled inline HTML for PDF output.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Creates WhatsApp deep links for invoice reminders and support messages with formatted text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps backend auth error messages to user-friendly strings with specific cases and a fallback.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile identifiers with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls to a DOM element with an offset for fixed headers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom color variables, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, features, known issues, and pending feature requests for a Node/Express + MySQL web app with admin and client dashboards.
